name: UICollectionViewController
desc: A view controller that specializes in managing a collection view.

items.name: init(collectionViewLayout: UICollectionViewLayout)
items.desc: Initializes a collection view controller and configures the collection view with the provided layout.

items.name: init(nibName: String?, bundle: Bundle?)
items.desc: Returns a newly initialized view controller with the nib file in the specified bundle

items.name: var collectionView: UICollectionView!
items.desc: The collection view object managed by this view controller.

items.name: var collectionViewLayout: UICollectionViewLayout
items.desc: The layout object used to initialize the collection view controller.

items.name: var clearsSelectionOnViewWillAppear: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating if the controller clears the selection when the collection view appears.

items.name: var installsStandardGestureForInteractiveMovement: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the collection view controller installs a standard gesture recognizer to drive the reordering process.

items.name: var useLayoutToLayoutNavigationTransitions: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the collection view controller coordinates with a navigation controller for transitions.
